mapper.select: SELECT cart.id, cart.goods_id, goods.shop_name, goods.cost_price, goods.pic, goods.status, goods.goods_unit, goods.abstracts, goods.stock, cart.goods_cart_counts FROM user_goods_cart cart JOIN shop_goods goods ON cart.goods_id=goods.id WHERE cart.cart_user_info_id = #{id} AND cart.live_id = 1 ORDER BY cart.id desc
